body:
Features and Enhancements

Network Builder and Optimizer
  • Find Provider Results
    • Allow results view to be switched from Groups View to Providers View
    • Save the user's last Providers/Group View choice and use it next time
    • Display confirmation dialog upon switching views if any selection was made

Issues Fixed

Imports and Specialty Mappings
  • Fixed an issue with specialty mapping assignment when adding a user to a project that has never been fully imported to production.
  • Fixed an issue with specialty mappings when a project is promoted to production without promoting specality mapping updates.
